headline: How PSEG’s LIPA Extension and Board Addition Could Shape Public Service Enterprise Group (PEG) Investors
summary: Public Service Enterprise Group announced that industry veteran Geisha J. Williams will join its Board of Directors on March 1, 2026, while also securing a contract extension to operate the Long Island Power Authority grid through December 31, 2030. Together with an analyst upgrade citing low-risk fundamentals and no expected 2026 rate case, these moves highlight PSEG’s emphasis on governance depth and operational stability. We’ll now examine how the Long Island contract extension and...
